K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-0: @422a / /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-1: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-2: bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-3: rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-4: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-5: lho phyogs rgya mtsho pha rgal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-6: de nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-7: ga la ba yi gnas su byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-8: mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-9: lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-10: ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-11: dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-12: de tshe bdud chen las rgyal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-13: ha ha hi hi'i sgra sgrog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-14: chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-15: gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-16: dpa' bo chen po ga la ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-17: dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422a-18: bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-0: tshul bzhin @422b 'bul gyi dpa' bo bzhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-1: lha ma srin ni sde brgyad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-2: srog gi yang snying phul ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-3: gshin rjes ya phul ma mos ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-4: srin bos ra phul gnod sbyin kshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-5: mi yis ni phul sa bdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-6: btsan gyis tsa phul bdud kyis da //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-7: de rnams gcig tu dril ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-8: bran du yang ni khas blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-9: gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-10: ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-11: bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-12: lha yi bsnyen pa rab chud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-13: sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-14: mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-15: ya m'a ra dza sa do me ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-16: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-17: ya da ro ni ra yakshe ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-18: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-21: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-22: chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-23: gshin rje'i pho nya la sogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-24: sgrol ba'i bran du byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-25: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-26: 'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-27: lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-28: nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-29: rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa la; ;bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-30: zhes pas dam bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-31: mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-021:422b-32: gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so //
